00034 class SWModule;
00035 class CSwordBackend;
00036 class CHTMLEntryDisplay;
00037 
00046 class CSwordModuleInfo : public CModuleInfo  {
00047 public:
00048     enum type { Bible, Commentary, Lexicon, Unknown };
00053   enum unlockErrorCode {
00054         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00055         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00056         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00057         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00058     };  
00059     CSwordModuleInfo( CSwordBackend* backend, SWModule* module );
00060     CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m );  
00061     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00065   CSwordBackend* backend() const;
00069   SWModule* module() const;
00074   const CSwordModuleInfo::unlockErrorCode unlock( const QString unlockKey );
00082   CHTMLEntryDisplay* getDisplay() const;
00087   const QString getCipherKey() const;
00093   const bool isEncrypted() const;
00098   const bool isLocked();
00102   const QString getPath() const;
00107   const QString getVersion() const;
00112   const QString getAboutInformation() const;
00116   const QString getDescription() const;
00122   virtual const bool search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percent)(char, void*));
00127   virtual ListKey& getSearchResult();
00131   virtual void interruptSearch();
00137   void clearSearchResult();
00143   virtual const bool supportsFeature( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type );
00147   void setFont(const QFont &font);
00151   const QFont getFont();
00155   const bool hasFont();
00159   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::type getType() const;
00163   const QFont::CharSet encoding();
00164 
00165 private:
00166     SWModule*   m_module;
00167     ListKey m_searchResult;
00168     CSwordBackend* m_backend;
00169 };
00170 
00171 //class CSwordModuleInfo;
00172 typedef QList<CSwordModuleInfo> ListCSwordModuleInfo;
00173 
00174 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::type CSwordModuleInfo::getType() const {
00175     return CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown;
00176 }
00177 
00178 inline SWModule* CSwordModuleInfo::module() const {
00179     return m_module;
00180 }
